## authentication package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AccessToken](./authentication.accesstoken.md) | Access token containing information for authentication |
|  [AuthenticationService](./authentication.authenticationservice.md) | Authentication service managing authentication |
|  [AuthGuard](./authentication.authguard.md) | Routing guard that is used for authorization of user |
|  [AuthInterceptor](./authentication.authinterceptor.md) | AuthInterceptor used for intercepting http responses and handling 401, 403 statuses |
|  [AuthInterceptorConfig](./authentication.authinterceptorconfig.md) | Configuration object that is used by AuthInterceptor, overriding its properties allows you to customize configuration |
|  [AuthorizationModule](./authentication.authorizationmodule.md) | Module for authorization |
|  [AuthorizeDirective](./authentication.authorizedirective.md) |  |
|  [SuppressAuthInterceptor](./authentication.suppressauthinterceptor.md) | SuppressAuthInterceptor used for intercepting http responses and suppressing 401, 403 statuses |
|  [UserIdentity](./authentication.useridentity.md) | Information about user in accessing system |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [authInterceptorProviderFactory(config, injector)](./authentication.authinterceptorproviderfactory.md) | Factory used for creating auth interceptor |
|  [Authorize(permission)](./authentication.authorize.md) | Used for setting required permission name for authentication |
|  [Éµa(options)](./authentication._a.md) | Factory used for creating AuthenticationService |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AuthenticationServiceOptions](./authentication.authenticationserviceoptions.md) | Options for authentication service |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AUTH\_INTERCEPTOR\_CONFIG](./authentication.auth_interceptor_config.md) | Token used for injecting custom configuration for AuthInterceptor |
|  [AUTH\_INTERCEPTOR\_PROVIDER](./authentication.auth_interceptor_provider.md) | Provider for proper use of AuthInterceptor, use this provider to inject this interceptor |
|  [AUTHENTICATION\_SERVICE\_OPTIONS](./authentication.authentication_service_options.md) | Authentication options token used for injecting into authentication service |
|  [SUPPRESS\_AUTH\_INTERCEPTOR\_PROVIDER](./authentication.suppress_auth_interceptor_provider.md) | Provider for proper use of SuppressAuthInterceptor, use this provider to inject this interceptor |
